languages.text: "Да, господин". {n}Мейв опускает взгляд.{/n} "Мы из низкого дворянства, а служить придворным потешником для самого губернатора — такая честь..."

traits.locale_text: "Да, господин. Его имя Дан. Мы росли сиротами, пока нас не взяли ко двору. Брат стал придворным потешником, а я служанкой при замковой кухне".

languages.text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."
languages.original_text: "Да, господин". {n}Мейв опускает взгляд.{/n} "Мы из низкого дворянства, а служить придворным потешником для самого губернатора — такая честь..."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We're lower nobility, and it's such an honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."
"Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We're lower nobility, and it's such an honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."
"Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We're lower nobility, and it's a real high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."
"Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We're lower nobility, and it's a real high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."
"Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."
"Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."

languages.text: 「はい、裁判官様」{n}メイヴは目を伏せた。{/n}「私たちは下級貴族です。総督直属の宮廷芸人を務めることは、大変な名誉なのです…」
languages.original_text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、裁判官様」{n}メイヴは目を伏せた。{/n}「私たちは下級貴族です。総督直属の宮廷芸人を務めることは、大変な名誉なのです…」

languages.text: "Evet lordum." {n}Maive, bakışlarını yere indiriyor.{/n}"Alt tabaka soylulardanız. Valinin şahsi saray eğlendiricisi olmak büyük bir onurdur."
languages.original_text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."

traits.locale_text: "Evet lordum." {n}Maive bakışlarını yere indiriyor.{/n}"Alt soylulardanız. Valinin şahsi saray eğlendiricisi olmak büyük bir onurdur."

languages.text: «Sí, mi señor». {n}Maive baja la mirada.{/n} «Somos nobleza menor y es un gran honor ser el bufón de corte del mismo gobernador...».
languages.original_text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, mi señor». {n}Maive baja la mirada.{/n} «Somos nobleza menor y es un gran honor ser el bufón de corte del mismo gobernador...».

languages.text: “确实如此，大人。”{n}梅芙垂下了眼睛。{/n}“我们是低等贵族。对我们而言，能在总督的宫廷里表演是难得的殊荣……”
languages.original_text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，大人。”{n}梅芙垂下了眼睛。{/n}“我们是低等贵族。对我们而言，能在总督的宫廷里表演是难得的殊荣……”

languages.text: « Oui, mon seigneur, {n}dit Maive en baissant les yeux.{/n} Nous appartenons à la basse noblesse, et c'est un grand honneur que d'être le bateleur attitré de la cour du gouverneur... »
languages.original_text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, mon seigneur, {n}dit Maive en baissant les yeux.{/n} Nous appartenons à la basse noblesse, et c'est un grand honneur que d'être le bateleur attitré de la cour du gouverneur... »

languages.text: "Ja, {mf|Herr|Herrin}." {n}Maive senkt ihren Blick.{/n} "Wir sind von niederem Adel, und es ist eine große Ehre, der höfische Unterhalter des Gouverneurs zu sein ..."
languages.original_text: "Yes, my lord." {n}Maive lowers her eyes.{/n} "We are lower nobility, and it is a high honour to be the governor's own court entertainer..."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, {mf|Herr|Herrin}." {n}Maive senkt ihren Blick.{/n} "Wir sind von niederem Adel, und es ist eine große Ehre, der höfische Unterhalter des Gouverneurs zu sein ..."
